snippet: A meeting attended by Hillary Rodham Clinton and President Thein Sein, spotlights the thaw in relations as Myanmar has relaxed its repressive rule.
abstract: Sec of State Hillary Clinton and Myanmar Pres Thein Sein meet in Cambodia, latest sign of significant warming of relations between the two countries; Thein says his government wants to attract American businesses that not only exported Myanmar's plentiful raw materials but also brought added value to the country to aid in its development.
lead_paragraph: A meeting attended by Hillary Rodham Clinton and President Thein Sein, spotlights the thaw in relations as Myanmar has relaxed its repressive rule.

headline.seo: Myanmar President Invites U.S. Businesses to Return
headline.main: Myanmar’s Leader Invites U.S. Businesses to Return
headline.print_headline: Myanmar’s Leader Invites U.S. Businesses to Return
